title: kaNgaLil teriya
sahitya:
ragA:  simhEndramadhyam   
  kaNgaLil teriyak-kaNDEn sakhiyE kaLippinil mUzhgit-tiLaittezhundEn


anupallavi

  kaNNIr malgiDa kAlamellAm Engi kANat-tavitta en kaNNan tiru uru
			rAg  nAyaki


caraNam 1    kaNmaNi undan eNNamarindu kaDugi vandEn unnai aNaindu magizhndiDa
 nANam viDutten nayanam nOkkenrAn kaNNoDu kaNNiNaittEn kanni ennuru kamalak-
    caraNam 2   			rAgA:  hamIrkalyANiAa:S R2 S P M2 P D2 N3 S  Av:  S N3 D2 P M2 G3 M1 G3 R2 S (TyAgarAja)  kaNNiDaiyE en karuttinil pughunda kArikaiyE unnaik-kaNam pirigirEn enru
 inmozhi pEshi idazhamudam tanda ennuyiranaiyAnin kAdal avan kaDaik-
    caraNam 3  			rAgA:  madhyamAvatiAa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 R2 S  eNNarum gOpiyar Enguvadai marandu kanrugaL kAligaL mEippadum marandu
 innishai pozhi vEinguzhalaiyum maranda kaNNanuDan nAn onrik-kalandadak-
